alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 5:34PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT TAYLOR AND MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EST... At 533 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Monticello to 17 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Steinhatchee, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Jug Island, Ebb, Hamburg, Pinetta, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Lovett, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Hanson, and Perry-Foley Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for Big Bend Florida.
